doc.title: Roots
doc.plot: A jazzy up-beat score propels a kaleidoscope of color and images. Shapes that suggest the sun and the sea evolve into other shapes that suggest creation: the planets, flowers, birds, seeds sprouting, protozoa and the beginnings of life, spinning, and constant movement. The images remain evocative and are rarely literal; the music, shapes, and movement connote and conjure rather than depict.
